alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel; Baltimore; Baltimore City; Cecil; Harford (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 5:52PM EDT until May 22 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL ANNE ARUNDEL...HARFORD...CECIL AND SOUTHEASTERN BALTIMORE COUNTIES AND SOUTHEASTERN BALTIMORE CITY... At 552 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Farmington to Pasadena, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Baltimore, Newark, Middle River, Elkton, Aberdeen, Havre De Grace, Riviera Beach, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Fort Smallwood State Park, Millers Island, North Point State Park, Sparrows Point, Back River, Calvert, Glen Burnie, Dundalk, Bel Air South, Essex, Parkville and Bel Air North. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Anne Arundel; Baltimore; Baltimore City; Cecil; Harford
